collectible.title: Real Knife
collectible.subtitle: A symbol of the bond between player and character.
collectible.text: You have overcome the enemy and born witness to their bodies. You have done so with me, as well. Good work. See you next time, partner.

collectible.title: The Locket
collectible.subtitle: You can feel it beating.
collectible.text: You have effortlessly soared through the game and rendered the opposition defeated, even at such a disadvantage. Fantastic work, partner.
collectible.unlock: Name yourself Frisk, then win a game in Hard Mode.

collectible.title: Chocolate Bar
collectible.subtitle: Not brand name.
collectible.text: Cheer up, partner. There is always next time. Until then, take this as a consolation prize.
collectible.unlock: Lose a game with me that I lose too.

collectible.title: Sans's Trombone
collectible.subtitle: It's dusty.
collectible.text: I suppose you could say our attack cut him... down to the bone!
